title: Advertising
description: The information related to advertising activity in relationship to the experience event.

xdm:adViewability.title: MRC viewability
xdm:adViewability.description: Media Rating Council (MRC) defines viewability as an online advertising metric that indicates the number of impressions that are actually “seen” by end-users. Viewability captures specific details such as player volume, library version, window status, and viewport ad measured dimensions.

xdm:adUnitDepth.title: Ad Unit Depth
xdm:adUnitDepth.description: Publishers may embed ad units inside containers/iFrames in order limit the ad's access solely to the code of the page. This describes how many 'containers' or iFrames the ad unit is displayed inside of.

xdm:viewportHeight.title: Viewport Height
xdm:viewportHeight.description: The vertical size (in pixels) of the window the experience was displayed inside measured at runtime. For a web view event, the browser viewport height.

xdm:viewportWidth.title: Viewport Width
xdm:viewportWidth.description: The horizontal size (in pixels) of the window the experience was displayed inside measured at runtime. For a web view event, the browser viewport width.

xdm:adHeight.title: Ad Height
xdm:adHeight.description: The number of vertical pixels of the player, measured at runtime. This can be larger than the size of the ad if the player has extra controls or thumbnails.

xdm:adWidth.title: Ad Width
xdm:adWidth.description: The number of horizontal pixels of the player, measured at runtime. This can be larger than the size of the ad if the player has extra controls or thumbnails.

xdm:playerVolume.title: Player Volume Percentage
xdm:playerVolume.description: The player volume percentage, measured at runtime where 0 is muted and 100 is maximum volume.

xdm:measurementEligible.title: Viewability Measurement Eligible
xdm:measurementEligible.description: Whether or not the ad was eligible to viewability measurement. An ad is eligible if the unit has a supported creative format and tag type.

xdm:implementationDetails.title: Viewabiltity Implementation Details
xdm:implementationDetails.description: The name and version of the library instrumented to measure viewability metrics.

xdm:viewable.title: Viewable Ad
xdm:viewable.description: Display ads are considered viewable when at least 50% of the ad is visible for at least 1 second. Video ads are considered viewable when at least 50% of the ad is visible while the video is playing for at least 2 consecutive seconds. All viewable ads are measurable, because you can't confirm that an ad has met the criteria for viewability unless it can be measured.

xdm:activeWindow.title: Active Window
xdm:activeWindow.description: Indicates whether ad was shown on active window on users' device.

xdm:percentViewable.title: Percent Viewable
xdm:percentViewable.description: Percent of pixels in the ad deemed viewable at measurement time.

xdm:viewabilityEligibleImpressions.description: Impression(s) of an advertisement to an end-user with viewablility library instrumented.

xdm:measuredAdNotVisible.description: Indicator of ad not being visible as measured by a viewability library at impression time.

xdm:measuredMuted.description: Indicator of ad being muted as measured by a viewability library at impression time.

xdm:measuredWindowInactive.description: Indicator of ad being displayed in an inactive window as measured by a viewability library at impression time.

xdm:unmeasurableIframe.description: Indicator of viewability library not being able to properly execute measurements due to ad being displayed inside an iframe.

xdm:unmeasurableOther.description: Indicator of viewability library not being able to properly execute measurements due to non-predefined error.

xdm:viewableCompletes.description: Completion(s) of an advertisement to an end-user deemed viewable at completion time by a viewability library.

xdm:viewableFirstQuartiles.description: First quartile(s) of an advertisement to an end-user deemed viewable at first quartile of play by a viewability library.

xdm:viewableImpressions.description: Impressions of an advertisement to an end-user deemed viewable after two seconds of play by a viewability library.

xdm:viewableMidpoints.description: Midpoint(s) of an advertisement to an end-user deemed viewable at midpoint of play by a viewability library.

xdm:viewableThirdQuartiles.description: Third quartile(s) of an advertisement to an end-user deemed viewable at third quartile of play by a viewability library.

xdm:adAssetReference.title: Ad asset reference
xdm:adAssetReference.description: Asset information about the ad captured by the experience event.

@id.title: Ad ID
@id.description: Identifier of the ad asset provided by media analytics customers. Following the Ad-ID standard [https://www.ad-id.org].

xdm:creativeID.title: Ad creative ID
xdm:creativeID.description: The ID of the ad creative.

xdm:creativeURL.title: Ad creative URL
xdm:creativeURL.description: The URL of the ad creative.

dc:title.title: Ad name
dc:title.description: The friendly and human-readable name of the ad asset.

xdm:advertiser.title: Ad advertiser
xdm:advertiser.description: Company/Brand whose product is featured in the ad.

xmpDM:duration.title: Ad length or duration
xmpDM:duration.description: Length or duration of ad asset in seconds.

xdm:adAssetViewDetails.title: Ad asset view details
xdm:adAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the ad playback captured by the experience event.

xdm:playerName.title: Ad player name
xdm:playerName.description: The name of the player responsible for rendering the ad.

xdm:index.title: Ad In Pod Position
xdm:index.description: The index of the ad inside the parent ad break, for example, the first ad has index 0 and the second ad has index 1.

xdm:adBreak.title: Ad break
xdm:adBreak.description: Details about how a timed advertising is inserted into a timed media.

xdm:completes.title: Ad completes
xdm:completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion but doesn't necessarily mean the end-user watched the whole video as the they could have skipped ahead.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Ad time spent
xdm:timePlayed.description: Describes the amount of time spent by an end-user on a specific timed media asset.

xdm:federated.title: Ad federated
xdm:federated.description: Indicates if an experience event was created through data federation such as data sharing between customers.

xdm:downloadedPlayback.title: Ad downloaded flag
xdm:downloadedPlayback.description: Set to true when the hit is generated due to playing a downloaded ad session.

xdm:conversions.description: A customer pre-defined action or actions which triggers an event for performance evaluation.

xdm:firstQuartiles.description: A digital video ad that has played through 25% of its duration at normal speed.

xdm:impressions.description: Impression of an advertisement to a end-user with the potential of being viewed.

xdm:midpoints.description: A digital video ad has played through 50% of its duration at normal speed.

xdm:starts.title: Ad starts
xdm:starts.description: A digital video ad has started playing.

xdm:thirdQuartiles.description: A digital video ad has played through 75% of its duration at normal speed.
